qas.question: What type of ground was Bern built on?
What is the elevation difference between the inner cities and the other cities?
Which city is higher, Matte or Langgasse?

context: Bern is built on very <a0_0>uneven ground.<a0_0/> There is an elevation difference of <a1_0>several metres<a1_0/> between the inner city districts on the Aare (Matte, Marzili) and the higher ones (Kirchenfeld, <a2_0>Länggasse<a2_0/>).
